thread.title: Are we creating a spoonfed generation?
thread.title_full: Are we creating a spoonfed generation?

author: ABC Radio National
title: Are we creating a spoonfed generation?
text:
Image: Some believe this generation of children are being 'over-parented'. (Pexels/Alexsandr Baladin/ CC0 ) 
Raising children into independent and happy young adults can be a long road with many pitfalls and rewards. 
But increasingly parents are being criticised for over-doing it, with terms like 'helicopter', 'tiger' and even 'snow-plough' being levelled at parents as accusations. 
We discuss parenting methods with the author of Spoonfed Generation ,Michael Grose, a firm believer in kids being more self-reliant, and self-confessed 'gentle' parent, Rebecca English.
